amendment.description: Amendment advances manufacturing in the state and local plans sections to assist American Veterans in obtaining better job opportunities in that field.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-16 to advance manufacturing in the state and local plans sections to assist American Veterans obtain better job opportunities in that field.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gallego.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
